ITS in Suwon

Implementation of Suwon ITS

  • 1st phase (1997-2001)

    Total Budget

    7,828 million won
    • Build Signal Control System
    • Construct Traffic Information Center

  • 2nd phase (2002-2005)

    Total Budget

    20,929 million won
    • Implement Traffic Information System
    • Expand Signal Control System

  • 3rd phase (2006-2007)

    Total Budget

    9,995 million won
    • Expand Bus Information System
    • Supplement Traffic Information System

Expansion with cutting-edge
Technology

  • 1st phase (2008-2017)

    Total Budget

    14,547 million won
    • Implement Urban Traffic Information System
    • Expand Bus Information System
    • ATMS Implementation Project
    • Expand Signal Control System
  • 2018
    「Suwon’s Master Plan for Intelligent Transport System (ITS)」

  • 2nd phase (2018-2023)

    Total Budget

    9,940 million won
    • Smart Intersection
    • Expand Bus Information System

Smart Emergency Vehicle
Preemption System

Reduce travel time of emergency vehicles (56.32%)

Prevent traffic accidents +
Secure golden time

Secure safety for emergency vehicles

Protect lives and property

  • Korea’s first introduction of a priority signal system for emergency vehicles
  • Reduce the risk of accidents of emergency vehicles due to traffic congestion, thereby protecting both citizens and first responders
